homePage.mainProvisionsText1: This panel is designed for convenient server management, including categories (disciplines), channels, roles (groups) of users, the users themselves, queues for defenses, and action logs. Each section is intuitive and allows you to perform the necessary administrative functions efficiently and quickly.
homePage.mainProvisionsText2: Use the sidebar on the left for navigation. Each menu section is responsible for a specific server management area. Icons are used on the pages for quick identification of actions and functions.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Home page of the server control panel with a description of the purpose, overview, and explanation of common actions available in the interface

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: This section allows you to manage categories (disciplines) on the server. Categories are used to structure channels and manage access to them

groups.title: Roles
groups.description: This section allows you to manage roles (groups) for users on the server. Roles are used to assign access rights to a specific category

users.title: Users
users.description: This section is intended for managing server users. Here you can view, rename, edit roles, and kick users from the server. It is also possible to filter users by their role

events.title: Queues
events.description: This section allows you to create queues for students. Queues are available as an interactive list that students can join and leave

logs.title: Logs
logs.description: This section provides access to the interaction log with the control panel. Tracks the actions of panel users and allows you to view them

hint.title: Hint
hint.description: Indicates the availability of additional information about or how to use it

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Opens the filter panel, which allows you to narrow down the data display results

createChannel.title: Create Channel
createChannel.description: Used to create a new channel within a specific category

createCategory.title: Create Category
createCategory.description: Used to create a new category with channels (disciplines)

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: Used to open the access and roles (groups) settings panel

createGroup.title: Create (assign) roles
createGroup.description: Used to create and assign roles (groups)

rename.title: Rename
rename.description: Used to rename items such as categories, channels, roles and users

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Used to delete a category, channels, or roles (groups) from the server

kickUser.title: Kick User
kickUser.description: Used to kick a specific user from the academic discord server

create.category: A category should be seen as a discipline, or a section with its own channels and access. After creating a category, it will be at the bottom of the list
create.channel: Enter a name for the channel and select its type
create.role: A group is a role on the server. After creating a role, it will immediately be sorted in ascending order

rename.category: Case is not taken into account for the channel name and is processed automatically
rename.channel: Case is not taken into account for the category name and is processed automatically

edit.category: Select roles for access to the category and all its channels

delete.category: When deleting a category, all channels in it will also be deleted

error.fetchAllRolesError: Failed to load the list of roles on the server
error.fetchCategoryRolesError: Failed to change the list of roles that have access to the category
error.fetchUserRolesError: Failed to load the list of user roles
error.saveCategoryPermissionsError: Failed to change the access settings of roles to the category
error.fetchEditableRolesError: Failed to load the list of available roles

warnings.noCategoryRoles: No roles with access to this category
